data.lyric:
[ti:A Girl Like You]
[ar:Easton Corbin]
[al:A Girl Like You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.05]A Girl Like You (你这样的女孩) - Easton Corbin
[00:00.89]
[00:01.49]Written by：Rhett Akins/Jesse Frasure/Ashley Glenn Gorley
[00:03.24]
[00:04.26]Got lots of bars around this town
[00:07.05]
[00:08.86]They got cold beer yeah and they got crown
[00:11.84]
[00:13.34]Got neon light in the windowpane
[00:16.34]
[00:17.70]Got lots of guys thinkin' they got game
[00:20.87]
[00:22.38]Got loud guitars a little out of tune
[00:25.55]
[00:26.66]But they ain't got a girl like you
[00:28.00]
[00:29.69]Now they don't
[00:30.09]
[00:31.68]They play lots of songs on the radio
[00:34.29]
[00:36.19]'Bout them good ole' country girls that we all know
[00:39.45]
[00:40.82]Long tan legs and cutoff jeans
[00:43.85]
[00:45.33]Yeah just shakin' that sugar every country boy's dream
[00:48.17]
[00:49.90]I've heard them all at least a time or two
[00:53.08]
[00:54.04]Ain't none 'bout a girl like you that's true
[00:57.34]
[00:59.12]You've got that beautiful born with it kind of thing
[01:03.75]It comes so natural no baby don't ever change
[01:07.70]
[01:08.53]And I wonder when I see the smile on your face
[01:12.38]
[01:13.61]Baby what did I do to ever get a girl like you
[01:17.62]A girl like you
[01:18.25]
[01:21.92]You can dress it on up or you can just hang out
[01:25.15]
[01:26.90]Kick it on broadway or kick back on the couch
[01:29.81]
[01:30.97]You can dance on a bar you can dance in the rain
[01:34.19]
[01:35.61]Shotgun a beer just sip champagne
[01:38.76]
[01:40.14]Yeah there's only one ain't room for two
[01:43.19]
[01:44.51]There ain't another girl like you another girl like you
[01:47.84]
[01:49.57]You've got that beautiful born with it kind of thing
[01:54.04]It comes so natural no baby don't ever change
[01:58.08]
[01:58.63]And I wonder when I see the smile on your face
[02:02.86]
[02:03.88]Baby what did I do to ever get a girl like you
[02:07.36]
[02:07.91]A girl like you
[02:08.59]
[02:11.57]Baby what did I do to get a girl like you
[02:15.38]
[02:26.74]A girl like you don't come along but once in a lifetime better hang on
[02:30.43]
[02:31.31]I can't find one thing wrong I could just go on and on and on
[02:35.91]
[02:37.50]You've got that beautiful born with it kind of thing
[02:42.02]It comes so natural no baby don't ever change
[02:46.05]
[02:46.89]And I wonder when I see the smile on your face
[02:50.71]
[02:51.76]Baby what did I do to ever get a girl like you
[02:55.37]
[02:56.02]A girl like you
[02:56.78]
[02:59.85]Baby what did I do to ever get a girl like you
[03:03.50]
[03:05.10]I could sail the ocean blue and never find never find a girl like you
